channel.description: RSS feed for the CampusNews2 list.

item.title: VeriCite replacing Turnitin - Fall 2017
item.description:
Article Description: VeriCite plagiarism detection software is now available for use in Canvas. The simple to use VeriCite native integration is replacing the Turnitin LTI tool which will no longer be available once summer term concludes.
Article Category: Insider Info
Article Content:
VeriCite plagiarism detection software is now available for use in Canvas.  The simple to use VeriCite native integration is replacing the Turnitin LTI tool which will no longer be available once summer term concludes.  Also, for those faculty who participated in the spring VeriCite pilot, be aware that there is now an improved VeriCite reports interface. 

Please contact Craig Keigher for more information
(815) 802-8402
ckeigher@kcc.edu


Article Date: 7/24/2017
Expires: 8/18/2017
item.author: Craig Keigher

item.title: Pearson REVEL integration with Canvas
item.description:
Article Description: Pearson has now released an integration with Canvas for their REVEL app. The integration has been setup and is now available for instructors to begin linking courses at their convenience. Please contact Craig Keigher for more information (815) 802-8402 ckeigher@kcc.edu
Article Category: Insider Info
Article Content:
Pearson has now released an integration with Canvas for their REVEL app.  The integration has been setup and is now available for instructors to begin linking courses at their convenience.

Please contact Craig Keigher for more information
(815) 802-8402
ckeigher@kcc.edu


Article Date: 7/24/2017
Expires: 8/18/2017
item.author: Craig Keigher
